summary: Global FM / “Gracy FM Radio Live” is a web/PWA app that loads thousands of worldwide radio stations from the Radio Browser API, provides search/selection UI, and streams the selected station with a resilient HTML5 audio player. The frontend is built with React + TanStack React Query (multi-layer caching and background lazy-loading optimized for slow networks), optional authentication via Internet Computer Internet Identity, and a Motoko backend canister that implements role-based access control plus user profile/statistics endpoints used by an authenticated user dashboard. The UI includes PWA install prompting, service-worker offline caching for core assets, donation modal, bookmarking, and a fully implemented 3D space + Earth/globe scene with radio pins and supporting UI elements (header/tagline/counter/toggles), with shadcn/ui components incorporated for consistent UI primitives.
architectural_notes: Frontend uses TanStack React Query as the primary async/state layer for station data and backend actor calls (query keys, staleTime/gcTime, invalidate/remove on refresh).

Station list retrieval is optimized for slow networks via multi-layer client caching (in-memory + IndexedDB + localStorage) with TTL and periodic persistence, plus continuous background batch loading.
Radio station fetching uses Radio Browser API with server failover and GPRS-friendly batching (limit/offset) and timeouts.
Station processing pipeline performs coordinate validation, deterministic coordinate-based deduplication, scoring, and sorting before caching/serving data.
Frontend authentication uses Internet Identity (AuthClient) with a React context provider; identity changes trigger actor recreation and query invalidation.
Backend is a Motoko canister with role-based access control (admin/user/guest), using in-memory Maps keyed by Principal for state.

PWA support via custom service worker (cache-first for static assets, network-first for navigations, network-only for streams/external APIs) plus registration/update hooks and an install prompt component.
UI is modal-driven (search/dashboard/donation) and uses localStorage for lightweight user preferences (bookmarks, dismissals).
3D rendering uses React Three Fiber + Three.js for a space/starfield backdrop (memoized geometries, per-frame animation).
3D scene now includes a functional Earth/globe and coordinate-based radio pin rendering (EarthScene/Earth/RadioPins/RadioPin) integrated with the existing Three.js space backdrop.
known_issues: useQueries.ts uses module-level mutable state for lazy-loading/caches; multiple hook instances or hot reloads can cause cross-instance interference.
AbortSignal.timeout() is used for fetch timeouts; older browsers may not support it without a polyfill.
BlinkingStars updates star sizes using Math.random() every frame, which can cause unnecessary churn/GC and non-deterministic twinkle behavior.
Audio spectrum analyzer visualization is not reacting to the currently playing audio stream (no response).

existing_features.title: Global radio station retrieval (Radio Browser API) with server failover
existing_features.description: Fetches stations from Radio Browser using correct query parameters (hidebroken=true, order=votes, reverse=true) with fallback across multiple API servers and a 15s timeout per server.

existing_features.title: Background lazy batch loading of stations
existing_features.description: After initial station data is available, automatically loads additional batches every ~3 seconds using offset/limit pagination until completion (stops after 3 consecutive empty batches).

existing_features.title: Station data validation and scoring
existing_features.description: Filters stations to require valid coordinates, resolved stream URL, country, and minimum bitrate threshold; computes a quality score (votes, clickcount, bitrate) and sorts deterministically.

existing_features.title: Deterministic coordinate-based deduplication
existing_features.description: Deduplicates stations by rounded lat/long (toFixed(3)) and selects the best station per coordinate using a deterministic scoring and UUID tie-breaker.

existing_features.title: Multi-layer caching for station list (memory, IndexedDB, localStorage, React Query)
existing_features.description: Implements a 45-minute TTL cache with priority: in-memory → IndexedDB → localStorage → network; keeps React Query cache updated and persists periodically during background loading.

existing_features.title: Global cache reset and refresh flow
existing_features.description: Provides clearAllCaches() to reset in-memory state, localStorage, and IndexedDB; UI refresh button invalidates/removes React Query cache and refetches fresh data.

existing_features.title: Station search overlay
existing_features.description: Modal overlay that filters stations by name/country/state/language, shows top results with result limits (top 50 default; up to 100 matches), and supports Escape/backdrop closing.

existing_features.title: Audio streaming player with resilient reconnection
existing_features.description: HTMLAudioElement-based player with play/pause, next/previous, close, and volume/mute controls; includes exponential-backoff reconnection (up to 10 retries) for errors/stalls.

existing_features.title: Playback info display with share support
existing_features.description: Displays the selected station’s name and location, derives a flag emoji from country code/name, and shares via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast notifications.

existing_features.title: Local bookmarks for stations
existing_features.description: Allows bookmarking/unbookmarking of stations by UUID stored in localStorage; bookmark state is reflected in the playback UI and used by the dashboard.

existing_features.title: User dashboard modal (bookmarks + aggregated stats)
existing_features.description: Authenticated dashboard modal that displays weekly/monthly/lifetime user metrics from the backend and lists bookmarked stations filtered from the global station list.

existing_features.title: Donation modal with copy-to-clipboard
existing_features.description: Donation UI with USDT (BSC), ICP, and Bitcoin addresses; includes clipboard copy, visual feedback, toasts, and Escape/backdrop closing.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication context
existing_features.description: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider using @dfinity/auth-client to load existing sessions, start login with configured derivation origin, and logout/clear identity state.

existing_features.title: Backend actor creation tied to identity
existing_features.description: useActor builds an anonymous or authenticated canister actor (identity-aware agent options), calls initializeAccessControl() after login, and invalidates/refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend role-based access control (admin/user/guest)
existing_features.description: Access control module assigns the first non-anonymous caller as admin, subsequent callers as users, supports admin role assignment, and enforces permissions for protected endpoints.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend user profiles and statistics APIs
existing_features.description: Stores user profiles, per-user stats, and channel status keyed by Principal; provides self/admin read APIs and aggregated totals (e.g., total weekly/monthly active users) for the dashboard.

existing_features.title: PWA offline support (service worker + registration)
existing_features.description: Registers a custom service worker and implements caching: cache-first for static assets, network-first for navigations, and network-only for radio streams/external APIs; includes update detection callbacks.

existing_features.title: PWA install prompt with dismissal tracking
existing_features.description: Captures the beforeinstallprompt event, shows an install prompt after a delay, records dismissals for 7 days, and hides itself once installed.

existing_features.title: 3D space background scene with animated starfield
existing_features.description: Renders a black-space background using React Three Fiber with a memoized points geometry starfield and per-frame opacity/size updates to simulate soft twinkling.

existing_features.title: Portrait orientation locking
existing_features.description: Attempts to lock screen orientation to portrait via the Screen Orientation API and includes CSS-based landscape rotation prevention for mobile devices.

existing_features.title: 3D Earth/globe scene with radio station pins
existing_features.description: Implements the previously stubbed EarthScene/Earth/RadioPins/RadioPin components so the app can render an Earth/globe visualization and place interactive station pins based on station coordinates.

existing_features.title: Implemented core UI chrome components (header/tagline/counter/toggles)
existing_features.description: Fills in previously empty UI components to provide complete app chrome and visual controls, including header/tagline presentation, station count display, day/night toggle, and additional scene elements.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integration
existing_features.description: Adds shadcn/ui-based component primitives and supporting tooling/configuration in the build template/front-end for consistent dialogs, buttons, inputs, and other UI elements.
